  • java.lang.Object
    • xtream.query.AOperator

extends java.lang.Object
implements xtream.interfaces.IOperator, xtream.interfaces.ILSStore

      • getLocalLSOffers

        protected xtream.core.loadshedding.LSOffer[] getLocalLSOffers(double[] newPTs)

        This method generates local (per operator) LSOffers so getLSOffers() can combine them with upstream offers.

        Should be implemented in implementing classes (operators) which are stateful operators.

        Parameters:
        newPTs -
        Returns:
        local (per operator) LSOffers

        Parameters:

        Returns:
